DOC.detailed_description: Introductory Statement : Our laboratory find patient chronic rhinosinusitis nasal polyp ( CRSwNP ) insufficient level vitamin D3 . This proposal conduct placebo control trial use vitamin D3 ( 5,000IU/day 6 week ) determine clinical immunologic outcome patient . General Investigational Plan : We routinely examine vitamin D level patient CRSwNP . Those insufficient ( less 32 ng/ml ) agree undergo sinus surgery randomize placebo vitamin D3 supplementation ( 5,000IU/day ) 6 week prior surgery . Blood drawn pre- post-supplementation examine systemic immune parameter dendritic cell T cell expression cytokine level . Sinus tissue collect time surgery analyze local immune parameter ( dendritic cell , T cell cytokine level ) supplement placebo group . Clinical outcome analyze use quality life questionnaire , endoscopic grade nasal peak inspiratory flow pre- post- supplementation . IRB approval research project pending .
